message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the joint source-channel coding problem from an information-theoretic perspective, which is a core topic in information theory. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the study of sufficient and necessary conditions for reliable transmission, which is related to statistical inference (cs.SI) and machine learning (cs.MM). The paper also discusses the separation principle, which is a fundamental concept in control theory (cs.DS) and optimization (cs.LG).
